name: Push 'n' Pop
description:
Description 

Push 'n' Pop is a game where 2-4 players must push and pull boxes in an open maze-like arena in order to crush the opposition.

Players must skillfully use their environment and block positioning to win, while making use of power-ups that increase player stats.

The game is currently in early development and still features placeholder graphics and bugs. It is not representative of the final product and is subject to change.

Controls

The game can be controlled using keyboard and most controllers.

Move: Analogue stick / WASD

Pull: West face button / Space key

Kick: East face button / E key

Use item: North face button / Q key

Concede: Right + left bumpers / G + U keys
